name: Bit (Janyarik)
description:
Controls:

Keyboard:

Game: A and D to move left and right, SPACE to Jump

Menu: W and S to highlight option, SPACE to Select

ESC to Quit

GamePad:

Game: Left Stick to move, Right Face Buttons to Jump

Menu: Left Stick to highlight option, A to Select

Start to Quit

If it breaks press Start please.
